name: Run to survive (Gelo007)
description:
You should run through the gate, choosing your path of development. Increase the character not only in height, but also in thickness and collect coins.

This is the simplest and very dynamic game.

Let's see how big and tall a character can become.

In order for the character to run, you just need to tap on the screen.

Turn around by moving the cursor left and right.

Blue gates increase the character, red ones decrease.

Reach the finish line as high as possible to collect more coins!
